name: Match a Block Final
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to move the cursor 

While holding the space bar you can move the blocks in the same row or column as the cursor

Press the arrow button in the home menu to open the upgrades where you can change the block spawn rates, increase your score multiplier, and slow the ingame timer

The hub world requires $1000,000 to enter but will not take that money. It is not even close to finished so please do not mark me on that

Press the update number in the home menu to open the update log where you can see everything that has changed
